SELECT * FROM control_board_file where control_board_idcontrol_board=#{id} and DEL_GB = 'N'

mapper.insert: insert into control_board (User_info_employee_num, title, contents, file_exist) values (#{User_info_employee_num}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file_exist})

insert into control_board_file (control_board_idcontrol_board, original_file_name, stored_file_name, file_size, create_id) values (#{control_board_idcontrol_board}, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size}, #{create_id});
mapper.delete: delete from control_board where User_info_employee_num = #{param1} and idcontrol_board = #{param2}
mapper.update: update control_board set title = #{param3}, contents = #{param4} where User_info_employee_num = #{param1} and idcontrol_board = #{param2}
